item.title: Imperial Questions Live looks into the tough subjects
item.author: Thomas Lim,Philip Kent,,
item.description: Last Wednesday saw the very first broadcast of Imperial Questions Live, a new current affairs debating programme asking the big questions on campus. The show, broadcast from the brand new Media Centre in the West Basement of Beit Quad, was presented by fourth year EEE student, Thomas Lim. The panel â€¦
